San Francisco- Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne says the company will run a two-minute commercial in the third quarter of the Super Bowl on Sunday, as part of the company's efforts to recast its image. I won't tell you what it's about but its worth watching, Sergio Marchionne said at a forum sponsored by JD Power at a hotel here ahead of the National Automobile Dealers Association three-day convention.
